Articles.Content:
I seem to be missing the little buttons that allow you to set hold, prograde ect on the flight screen. Any help would be appreciated. My mod list follows.

KSP: 1.0.4 (Win32) - Unity: 4.6.4f1 - OS: Windows 7 (6.1.7600) 64bit

USI Tools - 0.4.2

Ambient Light Adjustment - 1.4.4.2

remember that they're only there when you have SAS engaged.

Check that first. Some mods have their own guidance systems and tend to turn SAS off at times.

No, should be there, it is a probe core. I didn't realize anything was missing until one flight it showed up. Even tried clean with stock no mods clean install and it wasn't there. Looks like MechJeb isn't loading up either.
